rukus.text: 2|40|He isara'ila [1] bansadharagana [2]! Tomara amara se niyamatera katha smarana karo ya ami tomaderake diyechi [3] ebam amara sange tomadera angikara purna karo [4], ami'o tomadera sange amara angikara purna karabo. Ara tomara sudhu amake'i bhaya kara.

2|41|Ara ami ya nayila karechi tomara tate imana ano. Eta tomadera kache ya ache tara satata pramanakari. Ara tomara'i era prathama asbikarakari hayo na ebam amara ayatasamuhera binimaye tuccha mulya grahana karo na [1]. Ara tomara sudhu amara'i taka'oya abalambana kara.
2|42|Ara tomara satyake mithyara sathe misrita karo na [1] ebam jene bujhe satyake gopana karo na [2].
2|43|Ara tomara salata pratistha karo o yakata da'o ebam rukuâ€™karidera sathe ruku karo [1].
2|44|Tomara ki manusa ke satkajera nirdesa da'o, ara nijedera katha bhule ya'o [1]! Athaca tomara kitaba adhyayana karo. Tabe ki tomara bujha na
2|45|ara tomara dhairya o salatera madhyame sahayya prarthana karo [1]. Ara niscaya ta binayira chara [2] an'yadera upara kathina.
2|46|Yara bisbasa kare ye, niscaya tadera rabera sathe tadera saksata ghatabe ebam niscaya tara tamra'i dike phire yabe [1].
